maqras.text: Say Ona disbelieve Jeden created zem 2 dni ona set idols rank Him He je Lord universe
He miesto it stabilizers (mountains) robit it productive He calculated its provisions 4 dni satisfy needs z all its inhabitants
Potom He turned sky when it je still gas said do it zem Pojdem existence willingly unwillingly. They said My pojdem willingly
Thus He completed 7 universes 2 dni set zakon kazdy universe. My zdobit lowest universe lampa miesto guards it Such bol zamer Almighty Omniscient
they turn potom say ja warning ona z disaster disaster annihilated ‘Aad Thamoud
Ich posol ist them i mat rad before them after them saying Ona nie kult GOD They said Had our Lord willed He sent angels! My bol disbelievers co ona say
Mat rad for ‘Aad they turned arrogant zem opposed truth said Kto mocny than my? je they nie realize lenze GOD created them bol mocny than they? They bol unappreciative z our revelations
Consequently my sent them violent zranit a few chudobny dni. My thus afflicted them humiliating retribution v this zivot retribution Hereafter bol humiliating they never zvitazit
Mat rad for Thamoud my zadovazit them guidance they mat radsej blindness guidance. Consequently disastrous shameful retribution annihilated them co they zarabat
My vzdy save those verit lead righteous zivot
Dni pojdem when enemies z GOD will zvolat hellfire forcibly
Once they get there ich own hearing oci skins bear svedok everything they robit
They say do ich skins robit ona bear svedok us? They reply GOD robit us speak He bol Jeden zapricinit everything speak He je Jeden created ona prvy cas ihned ona spatny listok Him
There nie bol way ona zatajit z tvoj own hearing tvoj oci tvoj skins Skutocne ona myslienka GOD bol unaware z vela z co ona robit
This laskavy z myslienka tvoj Lord will zapricinit ona jesen i potom ona become losers
they zotrvat way they bol Hell bol ich destiny a they robit up excuses they nie excused
